# ChangeLog
## v1.1.2
* NODE-4746: IP address shown in ValidateInternals page is not correct for feature workloads, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4746

## v1.1.1
Fixed: Uncaught Error when host header is invalid.
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4579

## v1.1.0
* Moving rlogid generator from commons-ebay to share with internals apps
* Moving guid generator from commons-ebay to share with internals apps

## v1.0.1
* cafr, befr and benl sites are added.

## v1.0.0
* Incremented version to 1.0.0 to avoid problem with compatible upgrades not picked when version starts with '0'

## v0.3.2
* Corrected TLS mappings for TLSv1

## v0.3.1
* Corrected TLS mappings per review

## v0.3.0
* Added parsing of client TLS version header, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2601.

## v0.2.0
* Added: getRemoteAddrFromTrustedHeader method for VI validation, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2389

## v0.1.8
* Fixed: Remove protocol for server name https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2291

## v0.1.7
* Added `X-CLIENT-IP` for envoy as per https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1742

## v0.1.6
* Moved getClientInfo from commons-ebay to make it shareable

## v0.1.5
* Added API `getStaticUrl` for generating staic URL for `pages.ebay.*`

## v0.1.4
* Sending `ebay.com` when host header doesn't exists

## v0.1.3
* Added new API `getClientIP` for retrieving client IP from header

## v0.1.2
* Added `x-ebay-akamai-9` headers to IP address fetching
* Added new API `isIPFromAkamaiHeader` for checking Akamai IP hack

## v0.1.1
* Moved `getRemoteAddr` and `getServerName` methods from `commons-ebay` to `utils-ebay`
